subtitle: atti del Convegno internazionale, Università Cattolica del S. Cuore, Biblioteca ambrosiana, Milano, 12-13-14 ottobre 1999
title: Seneca e i cristiani
by_statement: a cura di Antonio P. Martina.

notes.value:
Bound.

Texts in French or Italian.

Proceedings of the conference held in Milan, 1999, on the occasion of the two thousandth anniversary of the birth of Lucius Annaeus Seneca (4 ca. B.C.-65 A.D.).

Includes bibliographical references.
